sections.title: Living Monolith (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Living Monolith class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Living Monolith)
sections.description: A living monolith gains no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond those from previous classes.

sections.title: Soul Stone (Su) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: A stone scarab embedded in the forehead that grants +2 saves against death effects, mind-affecting effects, and negative levels, plus 3/day swift action enlarge person ability.

sections.title: Ib Stone (Su) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Advances spellcasting from a previous class, gaining spells per day and spells known as if gaining a level in that class.

sections.title: Ka Stone (Su) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Grants Toughness as a bonus feat and full base attack bonus from living monolith levels when enlarged.

sections.title: Stone Blood (Ex) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Automatically stabilizes at negative hit points and becomes immune to bleed effects and blood drain ability damage.

sections.title: Fortified Flesh (Ex) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Flesh hardens like stone, providing scaling damage reduction, fortification against critical hits and sneak attacks, and disease immunity at 5th level.

sections.title: Stability (Ex) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Grants a +4 bonus to CMD against bull rush and trip attempts while standing on the ground.

sections.title: Tombsight (Su) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Perceives life and death balance in creatures as if using deathwatch and detect undead simultaneously at will with concentration.

sections.title: Greater Ka Stone (Su) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Ka stone enhancement now provides righteous might instead of enlarge person when invoked.

sections.title: Attunement to Stone (Sp) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Can use meld into stone at will as a spell-like ability.

sections.title: Summon Sphinx (Sp) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Can call a sphinx once per day as planar ally, with greater planar ally at 9th level, and gains +4 Diplomacy bonus with sphinxes.

sections.title: Communion with Stone (Su) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Gains tremorsense 30 feet, can use stone tell once per day, and learns Terran as a bonus language.

sections.title: Assumption of Stone (Sp) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Can use statue as a personal-range spell-like ability at will and becomes immune to petrification.

sections.title: Ageless Stone (Ex) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Becomes immortal by ceasing to age and gaining immunity to energy drain and death effects.

sections.title: Judgment of the Monolith (Sp) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: Can perform ritual inquisition once per day, functioning as speak with dead on corpses, mark of justice on living creatures, or contact other plane.

sections.title: Master Ka Stone (Su) (Living Monolith)
sections.description: When using ka stone to enlarge, regains hit points as if resting for a night without other rest benefits.
